mapper.sql: gid, gname, gprice, gtype, gnumber, gsalenum, gcontext, gdate, gnow
mapper.insert: insert into goods (gid, gname, gprice, gtype, gnumber, gsalenum, gcontext, gdate, gnow) values (#{gid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{gtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gsalenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gcontext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{gnow,jdbcType=BIT})

insert into goods
gid,
gname,
gprice,
gtype,
gnumber,
gsalenum,
gcontext,
gdate,
gnow,

mapper.update:
update goods
gname = #{gname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gprice = #{gprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
gtype = #{gtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gnumber = #{gnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gsalenum = #{gsalenum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gcontext = #{gcontext,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gdate = #{gdate,jdbcType=DATE},
gnow = #{gnow,jdbcType=BIT},
where gid = #{gid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update goods set gname = #{gname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gprice = #{gprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, gtype = #{gtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gnumber = #{gnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gsalenum = #{gsalenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gcontext = #{gcontext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gdate = #{gdate,jdbcType=DATE}, gnow = #{gnow,jdbcType=BIT} where gid = #{gid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
